page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: We are three children. We all live in Elmore. Our names are Andrea Davidson, Toby Allies and Sarah Fisher. The cows woke Toby up because they are right next door to him. Toby got up at 6.55a.m. He pulled himself out of bed and he looked at the war memorial over the road. He walked onto the landing. It was very peaceful and quiet. Everyone was asleep except his younger brother Oliver who asked him to play with him, so they played Spin. He watched a cartoon on T.V and then got dressed and then had some toast and a cup of tea. He collected his bag and started off for Sarah's. Andrea woke up at 7.30a.m. She got up and had her breakfast. She had cereals and a cup of coffee. Then she got ready for school. She rode down to Sarah's by bike. Sarah woke up at 7.00a.m. She went
